abstract: Jose Mourinho, Real Madrid's coach, is suspended for two games and fined $800 for his part in a brawl with his Barcelona counterpart.
snippet: Real Madrid’s coach, José Mourinho, was suspended for two games and fined $800 for eye-poking a Barcelona counterpart during a brawl.
lead_paragraph: Real Madrid’s coach, José Mourinho, was suspended for two games and fined $800 for eye-poking a Barcelona counterpart during a brawl.

headline.main: Suspension for Coach of Real Madrid
headline.print_headline: Suspension for Coach of Real Madrid
